scripts.build: npm run build:react && npm run build:react-native
scripts.build:react: rimraf react && svgr src --out-dir react --no-dimensions && babel react --out-dir react
scripts.build:react-native: rimraf react-native && svgr src --out-dir react-native --no-dimensions --native && babel react-native --out-dir react-native
scripts.release: npm version minor && npm publish . --access public
